screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .tm file in Google Teachable Machine
screenshot.caption: TM file open in Google Teachable Machine

description: Developers use Teachable Machine to create machine learning models (MLMs) that can recognize and categorize different images, audio clips, and poses. For example, a developer might use Teachable Machine to create a model that can recognize and categorize images of different types of fruit.

Teachable Machine users can save their MLM projects to their Google Drive or as a local file. These project files, which use the .tm extension, contain a copy of each of the image or audio assets a developer has added to their project. They also contain a manifest.json file, which defines their project's type (image, audio, pose), the version of Teachable Machine that created the project, and other metadata .
